org.mozilla.gecko

Class GeckoSharedPrefs

  • Object
    • org.mozilla.gecko.GeckoSharedPrefs

  • public final class GeckoSharedPrefs
extends Object
    GeckoSharedPrefs provides scoped SharedPreferences instances. You should use this API instead of using Context.getSharedPreferences() directly. There are four methods to get scoped SharedPreferences instances: forApp() Use it for app-wide, cross-profile pref keys. forCrashReporter() For the crash reporter, which runs in its own process. forProfile() Use it to fetch and store keys for the current profile. forProfileName() Use it to fetch and store keys from/for a specific profile. GeckoSharedPrefs has a notion of migrations. Migrations can used to migrate keys from one scope to another. You can trigger a new migration by incrementing PREFS_VERSION and updating migrateIfNecessary() accordingly. Migration history: 1: Move all PreferenceManager keys to app/profile scopes 2: Move the crash reporter's private preferences into their own scope

      • forApp

        public static android.content.SharedPreferences forApp(android.content.Context context,
                                                       java.util.EnumSet<GeckoSharedPrefs.Flags> flags)
        Returns an app-scoped SharedPreferences instance. You can disable migrations by using the DISABLE_MIGRATIONS flag.

        Returns a crash-reporter-scoped SharedPreferences instance. You can disable migrations by using the DISABLE_MIGRATIONS flag.

      • forProfile

        public static android.content.SharedPreferences forProfile(android.content.Context context,
                                                           java.util.EnumSet<GeckoSharedPrefs.Flags> flags)
        Returns a SharedPreferences instance scoped to the current profile in the app. You can disable migrations by using the DISABLE_MIGRATIONS flag.

                                                               String profileName,

      • getVersion

        public static int getVersion(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the current version of the prefs.

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Resets migration flag. Should only be used in tests.

      • migrateFromPreferenceManager

        public static android.content.SharedPreferences.Editor migrateFromPreferenceManager(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                    android.content.SharedPreferences.Editor appEditor,
                                                                                    android.content.SharedPreferences.Editor profileEditor,
                                                                                    java.util.List<String> profileKeys)
        Moves all preferences stored in PreferenceManager's default prefs to either app or profile scopes. The profile-scoped keys are defined in given profileKeys list, all other keys are moved to the app scope.

      • migrateCrashReporterSettings

        public static void migrateCrashReporterSettings(android.content.SharedPreferences appPrefs,
                                                android.content.SharedPreferences.Editor appEditor,
                                                android.content.SharedPreferences.Editor crashEditor,
                                                java.util.List<String> profileKeys)
        Moves the crash reporter's preferences from the app-wide prefs into its own shared prefs to avoid cross-process pref accesses.
